name: Curaxian
overview:
Curaxian is a specialized independent global e-commerce risk management and payment strategy firm. We help merchants solve risk and payment related challenges and develop best-of-class approaches to the secure and cost effective management of payment transactions.

Our flagship product is Curaxian Analytics - a cloud-based application that makes it dramatically easier to manage payment operations. It analyzes transactions to identify issues that affect revenue growth and profitability. It uncovers more problems and provides greater bottom-line impact than any other approach.
